name: Spider Swatter
description:
To a humble housefly, there is but one thing scarier than getting caught in a spider's web: getting caught in a web at a spider family reunion! Fortunately, you have your trusty magical swatter at the ready. It's as the saying goes: let flygones be flygones! Created for Mini Jam 123 based on the theme "Web" and with the limitation "There is no ground". Leave a rating here: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-123-web/rate/1866558

MECHANICS

Click on spiders to swat them before they reach the center of the web!

Blue Spiders move slowly toward the center.
Green Spiders move directly toward the center without taking any detours.
Red Spiders move swiftly toward the center.

CONTROLS

SWAT: Left Click
